about_the_game:
Step into the role of an adorable dungeon keeper in One Room Dungeon, where roguelike team building meets strategic inventory management. In this charming game, your tiny one-room dungeon is your fortress, and you must masterfully arrange minions, whimsical artifacts, and delightful items to fend off pesky raiding adventurers.



Features:

Grid-Based Inventory Management: Organize your dungeon with precision using a grid-based system. Every item has its place, and your success depends on keeping things tidy.



Positional Synergy: Position your units and items wisely to unlock powerful synergies. The right placement can mean the difference between victory and defeat.
Level Up Units and Items: Enhance your minions and artifacts over time, making them stronger and more effective against the adventurers.
Rotatable Items: Rotate your items to fit them perfectly in your limited space. Every square counts in your tiny dungeon.
Challenging Bosses: Face off against formidable but bosses will test your strategic prowess and the strength of your dungeon.



Unique Starter Characters and Builds: Choose from a variety of starter characters, each with their own unique abilities and play styles. Experiment with different builds to find the most effective strategies.

Protect your dungeon(home), outsmart the adventurers, and prove your worth as the ultimate dungeon keeper in One Room Dungeon!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11.x
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

name: One Room Dungeon Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A roguelike team builder, auto-battler meets inventory management, where you are a little dungeon keeper who has to fit minions, artifacts, and items in a very tidy way in his tiny one-room dungeon to empower himself to protect the dungeon from the raiding adventurers.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
